::Autofire::

Seeing Megatron sit down, Autofire presses a button on the control 
panel, a small energon cube popping out. He silently hands it to 
Megatron. The cube would be enough to take Megatron out of serious 
energy loss, but not nearly enough to power him to a point where he 
could successfully fight.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Megatron is forced to sit now, his energon ever detiriorating. He 
can
> almost taste the sweet feeling of his cells being powered up. He 
should
> have recharged along time ago, he thinks to himself, making a 
mental note.
